brand.name: kekai Swimwear
brand.ethicalInfo1: kekai swimwear is an Australian label that seeks to empower women of all shapes and sizes.
brand.ethicalInfo2:
kekai Swimwear's environment rating is 'great'. It uses a high proportion of eco-friendly materials including recycled materials. It manufactures locally to reduce its climate impact. Its use of eco-friendly materials limits the amount of chemicals, water and wastewater used in production.

Its labour rating is 'it's a start'. Its final stage of production is undertaken in Australia, a low risk country for labour abuse. There is no evidence it has a Code of Conduct. It traces most of its supply chain. There is no evidence it ensures payment of a living wage in its supply chain. It visits its suppliers regularly.

This brand makes products that are generally free of animal materials. We have not rated its impact on animals. The overall rating is based on environment and labour scores only.

kekai Swimwear is rated 'Good' overall.
brand.positiveText: Dear kekai Swimwear, I love the style and features of your products, and also that you care about people, the planet and animals. Good On You!
brand.negativeText: Dear kekai Swimwear, I love the style and features of your products, but I'm concerned about the impact of your brand on workers, the environment and animals. Until you do better I'll be looking for alternative brands that meet my needs.

journalArticles.title: The 10 Best and Worst Newly Rated Brands of April
